import React from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import { deleteDeck } from "../../utils/api/index" export default function DisplayDeck({ deck, deckPage, getDecks }){ const cards = deck.cards; const history = useHistory(); async function deleteHandler(id) { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete?")) { await deleteDeck(id); if (getDecks) { getDecks(); } getDecks(); history.push("/") } } if (deckPage) { return (

{deck.name}

{deck.description}

Edit
Study
Add Cards
) } return (
{deck.name}

{cards.length} cards

{deck.description}

View
Study
) }
